Content:: The Butterfly's Dream (Italian: Il sogno della farfalla) is a 1994 Italian drama film directed by Marco Bellocchio. It was screened in the Un Certain Regard section at the 1994 Cannes Film Festival.[1] This article related to an Italian film of the 1990s is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
